Looks like you’re just missing the directory,

Tells me your stylesheet is inside the /styles directory

Inside /styles now,

Tells us to look for /images inside /styles, which I assume (according to the links inside your html code) you want to be looking inside /images which is outside of styles

So changing the code to now read

Should tell it to go back up one level, and find the /images directory, the location of the file should also be wrapped in quotes.

You could confirm this by opening your web developer tools/inspector, and possibly seeing a 404 message for the image trying to be loaded.

Make sense? Let me know if not.
